trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_SEQ_00<tab>Eylgar would like to impose upon the kindness of an adventurer.

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_SEQ_01<tab>Eylgar has asked you to verify the claims of a Lalafellin peddler, who swears that winged beasts attacked him on the road south of Bentbranch. Retrace his steps and search for any evidence to support his story.

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_SEQ_02<tab>After stumbling upon a large vulture egg, two northern vultures descend to defend their nest. Now that you have slain the beasts, seek out Lothaire at Galvanth's Spire and tell him what transpired.

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_SEQ_03<tab>Lothaire is shocked to learn of the nest hidden less than twenty yalms from his post. He implores you to keep its existence a secret, and vows that similar incidents will never happen again.
TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_TODO_00<tab>Search for signs of the winged beasts.
TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_EYLGAR_000_1<tab>You're quite the compassionate adventurer, by the sound of it. Well far be it from me to look a gift chocobo in the mouth─I have need of a capable <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> like yourself.

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_EYLGAR_000_2<tab>We received a peddler at the gates the other day─an excitable Lalafell that was sweating and swearing that he had been attacked by large winged beasts. Yet other than hornets, I know of no flying creatures in this region.

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_EYLGAR_000_3<tab>If there's any truth to what he said, it might prove problematic for other travelers. Follow the road south and see if you can find any evidence to support his claim.

TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_EYLGAR_000_4<tab>And, should you find something, kindly tell Lothaire to patrol his area sometime instead of just standing beneath the spire and staring at the godsdamned road. In those words.
TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_LOTHAIRE_000_11<tab>...A northern vulture? Two? And they were defending a <var 1A 02 /var>nest<var 1A 01 /var>!?
TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_LOTHAIRE_000_12<tab>Well, I, uh...perhaps we could omit that last detail from any official reports. I would rather not give Eylgar any further cause to be cross.
TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_LOTHAIRE_000_13<tab>Thank you for slaying the beasts. You may rest assured that I will not permit this to happen again.
TEXT_SUBFST060_00381_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You hear the beating of wings...
